trans-unit.resname: PSDG·1 | Arden Angel | Card Name
PSDG·1 | Arden Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PSDG·1 | Arden Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, roll a four-sided die. If the result is 1, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, roll a four-sided die. If the result is 1, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PSDG·2 | Ashuza's Breath | Card Name
PSDG·2 | Ashuza's Breath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each creature, choose a number from 0 to 2 at random. CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: For each creature, choose a number from 0 to 2 at random. CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature.

trans-unit.resname: PSDG·3 | Camato Scout | Card Name
PSDG·3 | Camato Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. CARDNAME has landwalk of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. CARDNAME has landwalk of the chosen type.

trans-unit.resname: PSDG·4 | Hapato's Might | Card Name
PSDG·4 | Hapato's Might | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is a number from 0 to 6 chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is a number from 0 to 6 chosen at random.

trans-unit.resname: PSDG·5 | Lydari Druid | Card Name
PSDG·5 | Lydari Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each land on the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Those lands become the land types chosen this way. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each land on the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Those lands become the land types chosen this way. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

trans-unit.resname: PSDG·6 | Lydari Elephant | Card Name
PSDG·6 | Lydari Elephant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two numbers from 3 to 7 at random. CARDNAME's power is equal to the first number chosen and its toughness equal to the second number chosen.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two numbers from 3 to 7 at random. CARDNAME's power is equal to the first number chosen and its toughness equal to the second number chosen.

PSDG·7 | Murgish Cemetery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{B}, Discard a card: Create an X/X black Zombie creature token, where X is a number from 2 to 6 chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}, Discard a card: Create an X/X black Zombie creature token, where X is a number from 2 to 6 chosen at random.

PSDG·9 | Tornellan Protector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Until end of turn, each time damage is dealt to target creature or player, prevent X of that damage, where X is a number from 1 to 3 chosen at random each time.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Until end of turn, each time damage is dealt to target creature or player, prevent X of that damage, where X is a number from 1 to 3 chosen at random each time.
